name: supertest-login-dashboard-test-api
description: Testes automatizados da API de login e dashboard usando SuperTest e Mocha

scripts.test:report: mocha --require ./hooks/globalHooks.js tests/**/*.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=./reports,reportFilename=test-report,reportTitle='Relat√≥rio de Testes API' --timeout 10000
